archimate:BusinessObject.name: Project performance measures needs
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Identification of the project performance measures, which measure how well the project is satisfying it objectives

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: "Der Bedarf an Projekt-Leistungskennzahlen umfasst die Projekt-Leistungskennzahlen, die messen, wie gut das Projekt seine Ziele erfüllt".
Identification of the project performance measures, which measure how well the project is satisfying it objectives
